data.text:
BRIDGES TO FANTASY.

Slusser, George E., Eric S. Rabkin, and Robert Scholes (editors).

Carbondale and Edwardsville: Southern Illinois University Press, [1982]. Octavo, pp. [i-v] vi-xi [xii-xiv] [1] 2-231 [232-234: blank] [note: last leaf is a blank], cloth. First edition. Collects thirteen original essays, written specifically for the second annual J. Lloyd Eaton Conference on Science Fiction and Fantasy Literature, examining the structures, contexts and themes of the literature of fantasy, the goal of each being to "investigate particular ways in which these categories ultimately interact to produce a work of fantasy." Contributors include Harold Bloom, Roger Sale, and David Ketterer. [Reference: Barron (ed), Fantasy and Horror (1999) 11-84. Barron (ed), Fantasy Literature 7-54]. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. (#169408) (30042). Item #30042
